name: DAO-Art.eth Genesis Membership
description:
**DAO-Art.eth** is a Decentralized Autonomous Guild that follows **Code X** with a mission to find, fund, and protect true **Web3.0** projects in NFT, SBT, DeFi, DAO, Metaverse, and Play2Earn spheres. We come from the dark future where the whole world mixed into pure black emptiness - #000000. We are here to change the destiny of humanity with cooperative Angel support for Web3.0 BUIDLing teams and NFT artists, that will save the world from extinction.

**15 rules of Code X:**

1.  Seek Freedom, realize its actual value, and spread the knowing

2.  Get rid of stereotypes, judgments, resentments, and anger

3.  Be honest and sincere, especially with yourself

4.  Share and care about humans, animals, and the rest of the nature

5.  Build open-source Web3.0 products and communities, that is the only tool

6.  Never get arrogant or selfish, it will destroy you from inside

7.  Learn to control your dark side, to stay on the light

8.  Have fun and bring value to the community. Rewards will follow

9.  The only true incentives system is a retrospective one

10.  Learn to be completely self-sustainable and move closer to the seaside or mountains

11.  Help yourself first, then your family, then your friends, then your colleagues, then everyone else

12.  Allow yourself to be weak sometimes, but learn to keep your body and mind fit

13.  Let your ideas lighten your destiny and your path, that way will lead you to the happiness

14.  Love is the universal key to the solutions to all deep systematic problems of humanity

15.  Be loyal and dedicated to the community and principles of DAO-Art.eth

p.s. **Life is a game**

Thanks. Bye.
